short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean and simple habit tracking extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trackr is a simple yet powerful habit tracking extension that helps you build and maintain positive daily routines. With an intuitive interface, you can easily add habits and track your progress throughout the week, visualizing your consistency at a glance. Trackr allows you to set weekly goals, providing motivation and a sense of accomplishment as you work towards forming lasting habits. Whether you're trying to exercise more, read daily, or develop any other positive habit, Trackr is your personal accountability partner, right in your browser.
